Package it.polimi.ingsw.controller

Class Update

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.controller.Update
public class Update extends Object
The class update id an object returned to the controller after every execution of a command received by the players, it present the state of the game to the controller, is principally a class made of attribute and getter all the getter return an optional value to manage better null values.

    • Update

      public Update(Integer changedNumPlayer, Boolean playedCard, Integer numMovedStudents, Integer remainingClouds, Boolean activatedCard, Boolean movedMotherNature, Boolean finishedGame, Boolean isLastTurn)
      The constructor update create an update object initializing all his attribute
      Parameters:
      changedNumPlayer - reports the number of player in the game
      playedCard - played card notify is a card has been played
      numMovedStudents - reports the number of students moved
      remainingClouds - reports the number of remaining clouds
      activatedCard - reports if a card has been activated
      movedMotherNature - reports if mother nature has been moved
      finishedGame - reports if the is finished
      isLastTurn - reports if the last turn of the game
